questions.question: What is the precise purpose of the project?
What type of data do you collect and process?
Which method do you use to determine whether the data is personal/sensitive?
Can you achieve the stated purpose with less data?
Is your data usage proportional to its potential for both benefits and harm?
If/when you use personal data, do you anonymize or pseudomize it?
Is the data you use representative and up-to-date?
What action do you take to ensure data quality?
In case you process personal data, based on what legitimate ground do you do so?
What do you do to ensure you can respect the rights of the data subject?
Do you protect data against unauthorized or unlawful access, use, accidental loss, damage or destruction?
If you use personal data, what action do you take to regulate who has access to it?
Do you consult local knowledge to assess risks and potential for causing harm?
Did you complete the threat and risk assessment form?
Do you keep an up to date risk log?
Does your project respect relevant data laws of the country in which it is active?
Does your project respect the terms and conditions of third-party data providers?
